summary: John and Janet get a weird letter telling them to go to a ghost town which has an abandoned mine. There they contend with bad guys looking for hidden gold. They are aided by a mysterious Phantom.
cast: John Wayne|Duke|Sheila Terry|Harry Woods|Erville Alderson|Otto Hoffman|Martha Mattox|Blue Washington|Tom Bay|Bob Burns|Edward Burns|Ben Corbett|Jim Corey|Charles Le Moyne|Ken Maynard|Bud Osborne|John T. Prince|Tarzan|Blackjack Ward|Slim Whitaker
director: Directors: Mack V. Wright, Hugh Harman (uncredited) | 1 more credit Â»
title: Haunted Gold
